editorActions.insertFailedMessage: Sorry, something went wrong while inserting the text.

editorField.sharingActiveDefaultText: An email was shared with this issue

feedBackButton.subject: Feedback Outlook Email for Jira
feedBackButton.htmlBody:
Hey guys,

I like the app, but there is at least one thing you have to improve:

globalErrorBoundary.thanksForReporting: Thank you for reporting this issue!
globalErrorBoundary.title: Sorry, we couldn't display the app properly.
globalErrorBoundary.descriptionLine1: Something critical went wrong, you need to reopen this dialogue. If this happens frequently, you can try logging out and removing all instances to reset Outlook Email for Jira.
globalErrorBoundary.descriptionLine2: If this doesn't solve your issue, we'll be happy to help you solve it if you send us the error details below.

fieldErrorBoundary.errorMessage: Sorry, we couldn't render this field correctly and it will not be sent to Jira.
fieldErrorBoundary.reportInstruction: Please report what type of field it is

instanceSettings.notLoggedInMessage: You are currently not logged in.
instanceSettings.loginErrorDescription: There has been an error during the login:
instanceSettings.yasoonConnectionErrorDescription: We couldn't connect to our backend server at *.yasoon.com. This might be caused by a restrictive firewall. You can just continue to use the add-in but some features may not work as expected. If you want to have the full functionality, please make sure to add (or ask your IT to add) yasoon.com to the whitelist
instanceSettings.jiraConnectionErrorDescription: We couldn't connect to the Jira instance. At first, please make sure you have typed in the URL correctly.
instanceSettings.jiraConnectionErrorRequirements: If the URL is correct, the Jira system may not meet the {link}.
instanceSettings.jiraConnectionErrorMissingServerAddon: If you have a self-hosted Jira instance, it needs to have our {link} installed (and it needs to run on https).
instanceSettings.jiraConnectionErrorContactSupport: If you think this is an error, please {link}.
instanceSettings.jiraSSOErrorDescription: We couldn't connect to the Jira instance. If you have SSO enabled in your Jira instance make sure to follow the {link}.
instanceSettings.jiraHttpConnectionOfficeAddIn: Connecting to a Jira instance running on http is not possible in a modern Office Add-In.
instanceSettings.jiraHttpConnectionGetComAddIn: We recommend trying again with our {link} (only available for Windows)
instanceSettings.alreadyConnectedDescription: You are already connected to this system.
instanceSettings.cannotReadJiraUserError: Cannot read own Jira user - try again.
instanceSettings.cannotCompleteLogin: We couldn't complete the login to the Jira instance. Please check our {link}.
instanceSettings.noSupportDescription: This version of Outlook Email for Jira needs an update of the Jira app. Please update the app from the Atlassian Marketplace first.

basicLogin.headline: Connect to Jira

basicLogin.invalidCredentialsDescriptionServer: Please check your credentials and try again.
basicLogin.errorDuringLoginDescription: An error occurred during login. {{message}}. Please contact your Jira Admin and make sure Basic Auth is enabled.

errorMessages.noSDSupportDescription: You need at least Jira Service Management 3.3.0. You have
errorMessages.errorOnLoginDescription: Sorry - we cannot read your own Jira user. Most likely this is a temporary error and you can try it again.
errorMessages.openEmailFormDescription: We could not open the email message form.
errorMessages.internalErrorDescription: Sorry - we could not parse your input. This is most likely a bug on our side and it would be great if you report it. No issue has been created

errorMessages.incompleteIssueDescription: The issue was created but it might be incomplete. Please close this window and check the issue manually
errorMessages.selectIssueDescription: Please select an issue you want to comment. You can either search by key and title or filter by project
errorMessages.noContentDescription: Please enter a comment or select at least one attachment for upload.
errorMessages.updateJiraIssueDescription: Sorry - we couldn't add the comment to the issue due to

errorMessages.genericError: Sorry, time tracking could not be saved

sharePermissionType.heading: Who should be able to see this?

shareItemLogin.heading: Share this conversation!
shareItemLogin.firstParagraph: You can allow other users to see this mail/conversation live within Jira. To use this feature, you only need to connect your Microsoft account with your Jira account.
shareItemLogin.secondParagraph: Each time you want to share you can choose whether everybody with access to the issue can view that mail/conversation or only those in your company.
shareItemLogin.multiInstance: You will need to do this once for each of your connected Jira instances.

onboarding.shareItemText: You can now share your whole conversation and see all replies in Jira.

shareObjectTypeSettings.heading: What do you want to share?
